column4: i want to try "enable hardware accelerator" function at the flashplayer? but is this a increase my video performance?
but my cpu load very high even then
are your video drivers installed properly?
what video card do you have?
what do you mean that your cpu load is "very high" how high is it?
how high? what type of CPU? does it get lower when you enable hardware acceleration or higher or stay the same?
i'm use amd athlon 64 3000+, flash videos consumpt my cpu cycle appr. %90 proportion
which version of flash? which web browser?
if you turn hardware acceleration off does the CPU go back to normal?
im sorry i have no idea what is causing the problem, perhaps you should try a stable version of flash instead of beta?
